data.title: List of roads in Bangladesh
data.text:
The road network of Bangladesh consists of national highways (designated by a number preceded by "N"), regional highways (R numbers) and zilla or district roads (Z numbers) which are maintained by Roads and Highways Department, as well as Upazila Roads, Union Roads, and Village Roads which are maintained by Local Government Engineering Department.The total length of roads in Bangladesh used to 27,600km in 2006 and it increased to almost 15 folds in 2022. The total length is more than 375,000 km in 2023.[1]
